name: Boston Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker, and dry shake for 15-30 seconds. Add ice to shaker and shake for another 15 seconds.  Double strain into a chilled coup glass. Express lemon twist overtop of cocktail, and garnish with 3 drops for bitters

name: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Add all ingredients into shaker with ice, and shake for 15-30 seconds.  Strain into a double Old-fashioned glass over ice. Garnish with orange slice and cherry

name: Old-Fashioned
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass with ice, and stir until cocktail is cold.  Strain into a double Old-fashioned glass over ice. Express orange and lemon twist over the cocktail, then add each into the cocktail.

name: Vermouth Cocktail
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass with ice, and stir until cocktail is cold.  Strain into a chilled coupe. Express the lemon twist over the cocktail, and set it on the edge of glass.

name: Ti' Punch
instructions: Muddle lime coin with cane syrup in a double Old-fashioned glass.  Add the rum and fill the glass with ice. Stir the cocktail and serve.

name: Fancy Free
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass with ice, and stir until cocktail is cold.  Strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over ice. Express the orange twist over the cocktail, then add it into the cocktail.

name: Monte Carlo
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass with ice, and stir until cocktail is cold.  Strain into a double Old-Fashioned glass over ice. Express the lemon twist over the cocktail, then add it into the cocktail.

name: Chrysanthemum
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass with ice, and stir until cocktail is cold.  Strain into a chilled coupe. Express the orange twist over the cocktail, then add it into the cocktail.

name: Stinger
instructions: Add all ingredients into a shaker, and shake for 5-10 seconds, strain into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with pebbled ice. Garnish with mint.

name: Improved Whiskey Cocktail
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass with ice, and stir until cocktail is cold.  Strain into a Old-Fashioned glass over ice. Express the lemon twist over the cocktail, then add it into the cocktail.

name: Champagne Cocktail
instructions: Saturate the sugar cube in bitters and drop it in a chilled champagne flute. Slowly fill flute with champagne. Express the lemon twist over the cocktail, then add it into the drink.

name: Mint Julep
instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass with ice, and stir until cocktail is cold.  Strain into a Old-Fashioned glass over ice. Express the lemon twist over the cocktail, then add it into the cocktail.
